body: great art, wish the artist will draw more comics

@ciryk benedict and violet could be siblings. Benedict has a sister in the novel, that he forgot how she looked like. Violet doesn't know her parents so....it's a possible theory. not mine but the novels' translator seems to think they might be brother and sister.
cool artstyle but why dietfried???? i mean- i like him but.... why him??? it could have been gilbert (or benedict i dont mind ;))
omg its a ditfried x violet....... mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm..... keep ur mind open
